name: ba2tk
description: read information from gamebryo ba2 files (very basic)

scripts.submodules: git clone --depth=1 https://github.com/Nexus-Mods/ba2tk ba2tk || cd ba2tk || git checkout a0c429183b7ed35ffadd0cc6cc1258eea380a102 || exit /b 0
scripts.install: npm run submodules && autogypi && node-gyp configure build

author: Black Tree Gaming Ltd.
